document_data.caption: A map of Callidyrr showing Regent's Field.
document_data.name: Regent's Field
document_data.mainbody: '''Regent's Field''' was a small town located in the kingdom of [[Callidyrr]] on the island of [[Alaron]] within the [[Moonshae Isles]].{{Cite interactive atlas}}{{Cite dungeon/196/Backdrop: The Moonshae Isles}}
document_data.Geography: Regent's Field was located along the [[High King's Road]] in the county of [[Stirgewick]]. The town sat within the open plains found just south of the [[Dernall Forest]].
